full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (ZHES DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RTZOD DUS KYI THA MA'I RANG CAG SEMS CAN RNAMS LA MI DANG MI MIN GYI GNOD LA HCAR LTAR 'BAB PA'I DUS 'DI LA, RANG BZHAN KUN LA PHAN PA DANG, KHYAD PAR RIGS DANG RUS SHIN TU MTHO ZHING PHUN SUM TSOGS PA DAD DANG DAM TSIG GTZANG MA RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA, THU SHE YE GUNG KHUN RING LI T'UR GI CHE RIN CHEN RDO RJE'I DON DU, ,SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DZNY'A NA MING CAN GYIS BRIS SO, ,BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
